headline: Rick Wilson speculates Elise Stefanik leaked McCarthy recording -- and warns GOP leader to 'get a food taster'
author: Sarah K. Burris
sentences: According to recordings released to New York Times reporters Jonathan Martin and Alex Burns, McCarthy was pushing Donald Trump to resign, while also making it clear to the caucus that he opposed Trump's behavior.

So, I think if Kevin is thinking through his immediate future, telling major donors as he has been, that unless they keep him he can't block the Trump people.I think Kevin should get a food taster at this point."
Speaking to Joy Reid on MSNBC Friday, Lincoln Project co-founder Rick Wilson said that from what he understands the anti-McCarthy attacks are secretly coming from Rep. Elise Stefanik (R-NY).
Republican House Leader Kevin McCarthy (R-CA) is feeling the heat after it was revealed that he wanted former President Donald Trump out after the January 6th MAGA riots.
You know, with the people that — the horse race right now in Washington — it was Jim Jordan for a while who looked like the one who would take down McCarthy.
But today, the buzz in D.C. is all about Elise Stefanik, that she's the one who is behind some of this and she's putting the knife into this guy.
There are a half-a-dozen aspirants to the throne and all of them have had a closer relationship with Trump than McCarthy has had.
McCarthy previously said reports about his comments were false -- until the authors released the tapes.
"This is cut six from my producers: before she became a Trump cult leader she called him misogynistic.
So, to stay with you for a minute, Rick, they're just exchanging — all of them are Kevin McCarthy!
The problem I see here is spinelessness, cowardice, and this desperation for power at all costs.
They're all clutching for the ring and, you know, they all think they're going to get it."
Reid noted that Stefanik is just as much of a hypocrite about Trump as McCarthy has been.
They've always had some hostility between them and Trump never forgets a slight.
She urged him to release his tax returns and she went after him," said Reid.
And, he literally said, I'm glad the Democrats are going to take him out.
Remember, in 2016, Kevin said 'Oh, I think [Vladimir] Putin pays Trump.'
She called him to recognize that Russia attacked the 2016 election.
Mitch McConnell can't stand Donald Trump, you can tell!

See the conversation below:
Stories Chosen For You
She has a very close relationship to Trump.
She's gone full MAGA in every way.
They have never gotten better.
She called him soft on Putin.
That divided those two men.
Kevin is not of that world.
"There is no question, Joy.
She's extremely ambitious.
"She is Kevin McCarthy!
